title: Gordon Ramsay's CBBC star daughter Tilly and Gino D'Acampo's son 'couple up'
text:

Gordon Ramsay has revealed his daughter Tilly is dating Gino D'Acampo 's son.

Budding chef Tilly, 17, who has her own CBBC show Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch, grew close to Gino's boy, also 17, while their dads were filming new TV show Men Behaving Badly.

The Kitchen Nightmares star, 52, shared news of his daughter romance with the offspring of his pal Gino, 43, during an appearance on The Jonathan Ross Show.

When he was asked about rumours the teenagers had grown close, famously foul-mouthed Gordon described the situation as a "f***ing nightmare".

Jonathan joked: "Is this an arranged marriage we are looking at?

"It is Gino's son who is by the way a very handsome man - I think Gino isn't the father."

(Image: Handout)

(Image: BBC)

Gordon said: "We were driving through San Francisco and FaceTiming Luciano, and all of a sudden Tilly pops up behind them, and they are out having lunch.

"I think they are friends."

But Jonathan quipped: "I have heard they are more than friends."

The duo then joked that Gino would be becoming Tilly's father-in-law.

(Image: PA)

(Image: Handout)

Jonathan later took to his Twitter page to announce the union of the two famous chefs' families.

He said: "Uniting of the two dynasties' - can you believe Gordon's daughter is dating Gino D'Acampo's son!"

Fans were quick to react.

"They might have to double barrel ... D’Ramsay," one joked.

(Image: ITV)

Another aimed a comment at Gino's son, saying: "Tell him to invite his dad around, teach him how to cook Italian food properly."

And one said to Gordon: "TBF fancy having you as a Father in Law.......f**k me' be scared s**tless."

Dad-of-five Gordon also revealed he fainted during the birth of his baby son Oscar, three months.
